oai_dc:dc.dc:title: V.L.A. balloons during maneuvers at Camp Tyson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "V.L.A. Balloons Protect Troops and Supply Trucks during Maneuvers at Camp Tyson, Tenn." Color tinted and enhanced photograph of military troops at Camp Tyson practicing maneuvers with trucks and barrage balloons. Features a divided back with handwritten correspondence on reverse. Postcard printed on linen. March 25, 1944 postmark. [No. 3B596-N]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Barrage balloons; Military camps; Military personnel; Military training; Trucks
